fxInfo_question: How would you describe the areas of the country where government officialsâ€™ respect for civil liberties is significantly stronger?

fxInfo_responses.value: Rural. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2clrgstch_0]
Urban. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2clrgstch_1]
Areas that are less economically developed. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2clrgstch_2]
Areas that are more economically developed. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2clrgstch_3]

Areas where illicit activity is widespread. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2clrgstch_11]
Areas that are very sparsely populated. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2clrgstch_12]

Areas where there are indigenous populations. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2clrgstch_14]
Areas where the national ruling party or group is strong. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2clrgstch_15]

Areas that were subject to a longer period of foreign rule. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2clrgstch_17]
Areas that were subject to a shorter period of foreign rule. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2clrgstch_18]
Areas that were recently subject to foreign rule. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2clrgstch_19]
Areas that have not recently been subject to foreign rule. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2clrgstch_20]
None of the above. (0=No, 1=Yes) [v2clrgstch_21]
